title: SBF Political Capture Network 5.2 Million Biden Donations
summary: Sam Bankman-Fried emerges as major Democratic donor, contributing $5.2 million to support Joe Biden and Democratic causes using FTX customer funds. Donations target organizations in global poverty, climate change, AI safety, and biosecurity - all core EA cause areas. Strategy uses EA ideological framework to justify political influence operations while building regulatory capture network. Donations create access to policymakers and position SBF as thought leader in crypto regulation discussions.
